overview: Sandravinany is a small village in the South-East of Madagascar. The nearest city is two days aways from this isolated village. 30 years ago, the farmers living there had the opportunity to diversify their activity by fishing lobsters for the collecting buyers from Fort Dauphin. This activity, lucrative at first, ended up disrupting the traditional way of life of the community and brought new problems...
title: Le Péché de la langouste
